Rulings.Base: 1. This card can be activated during the Damage Step before, but not during, damage calculation.\n2. Even if your opponent's monster is in Attack Position when this card resolves, the effect is still applied. If the monster is no longer face-up on the field, the effect is not applied.\n3. If you take control of your opponent's monster before this card resolves, its effect is not applied.
